text:
My design software evolution over the years looks like this
:blue_heart:Photoshop > :orange_heart:Sketch > :black_heart:Figma, where the last one is the primary tool but I occasionally use Sketch. It happens only for my personal stuff

Figma wins for it’s live time collaboration and ability to work from any device right away. Love it so far!
Hi, I've another question. For some reason after I send form, it completely disappears, it's not even some "display:none", all <form> tag just vanish right after succesful send. How to prevent that?

Another contributing factor we've noticed;

• *"Collect data from website forms"* is _*enabled*_ on new portals by default. Disabling this prevents a JavaScript file from being included on every page.
We've recently managed to achieve a 99% performance score on Lighthouse Desktop, with around 89% on mobile. Of course this is not the same as Page Speed Insight, but as yet our site is not yet indexed by Google to see what we've achieved there.

A question for <@U7SL518D6> I have is around our final red-line item which is "_Serve static assets with an efficient cache policy_". I know that for a user, 14 days might as well be 365 days in terms of user experience, but Google seems to think otherwise. Any plans to review that duration, or perhaps let us define a duration?
@everyone Quick question, I am running through a security audit with a client and the auditors have asked if HubSpot Backups are Encrypted and if so how?
Thanks Kieran, I have read this but it doesn't say  if backups are encrypted and if they are to what level
I would reach out via customer support
I imagine they’ll be able to give you an official answer! I imagine it’ll be yes though. Encryption at rest is a pretty standard requirement :slightly_smiling_face:

That's the expected behavior :slightly_smiling_face: on submit, the form will either display a thank you message or redirect the entire page. Check out a discussion on this in the HubSpot forums - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Can-we-show-HubSpot-form-after-successfully-message-send/td-p/228983>
I've tried that, but I just can't create that form again in that onFormSubmit nor onFormSubmitted
